name: Age of Solitaire
description:
"Age of Solitaire" is the third part of the famous "The far Kingdom" series. Play different Solitaire versions and use the power of the magic cards to help Arianna rebuild her kingdom!

• Play solitaire and rebuild your kingdom!
• Collect the missing relics and hidden gold
• Defend the kingdom from hordes of monsters
• Stunning graphics and relaxing soundtrack
